actions.name: Shell Shield

cost.trigger: An adjacent ally creature is hit with a Physical or Special-category attack

actions.description:
Trigger: An adjacent ally creature is hit with a Physical or Special-category attack
Effect: Connection - Withdraw. The user and triggering ally swap positions and the user may use Withdraw as an [Interrupt 2] before resolving the damage of the triggering attack.

system.description:
Trigger: An adjacent ally creature is hit with a Physical or Special-category attack
Effect: Connection - Withdraw. The user and triggering ally swap positions and the user may use Withdraw as an [Interrupt 2] before resolving the damage of the triggering attack.
